analysis.description:
EXLINKCOIN.approve (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#135-140) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-IterableMapping.insert(allowed[msg.sender],spender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#139-140)

EXLINKCOIN.changeAutherOwner (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#536-573) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-IterableMapping.insert(allowed[msg.sender],key,value) (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#551-553)
	-IterableMapping.remove(allowed[owner],key2) (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol)

EXLINKCOIN.transfer (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#94-114) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- balances[msg.sender] - tokens < lockedUsers[msg.sender].lockedTokens (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#99-105)
	- lockedUsers[msg.sender].lockedTokens > 0 (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#97-105)

EXLINKCOIN.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#114-135) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lockedUsers[from].lockedTokens > 0 (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#118-127)
	- balances[from] - tokens < lockedUsers[from].lockedTokens (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#121-126)

EXLINKCOIN.TryUnLockBalance (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#277-306) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= user.lockedTime (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#285-304)

EXLINKCOIN.miningEveryDay (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#319-362) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- day > 0 && max_while > 0 && mineTotalBalance > 0 (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#332-360)
	- day > 0 (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#328-362)

EXLINKCOIN.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#149-151)
EXLINKCOIN.icoPrice should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#190-192)
EXLINKCOIN.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#147-148)
EXLINKCOIN.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#148)
EXLINKCOIN.taskTotalBalance should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#183-188)
EXLINKCOIN.totalEXLCSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#151-155)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/15/0x62712b94ef00e75614dc4f7a9f1d78e49e929a3a.sol#1): it allows old versions
